title: Famous Grouse
author: Famous Grouse
content: Hi to Everyone who survived the worst Crypto Crash down in History!Hopefully you protected your Capital...Hope you don't give up and Continue Trading...Someday the Crypto industry won't be "played with" by Supposed Big Players and Leaders in the Market...For those who had loss, you will recover!Hope you learned from this CHARADE!If you Survived, then see you in the Bull Run üí™üèæDon't be fooled, this isn't the time to chase the Bottom to Buy the Dip, this is the time to Survive and secure your Capital and FundsMuch Love to you all ‚ù§Ô∏èCheers and please stay strong üç∑

comments.author: glendall
comments.body: Spirit also for you, I agree with you today is the time to survive not to buy, because the state of ecomony is also very bad, where we have to survive through this economic crisis,

comments.author: posi
comments.body: Quote from: glendall on November 10, 2022, 01:32:35 PMSpirit also for you, I agree with you today is the time to survive not to buy, because the state of ecomony is also very bad, where we have to survive through this economic crisis,Why be pessimistic, if you say this is not the time to invest in altcoins then I totally agree with you, but for bitcoin this is the right time to own bitcoin cheaply. I know the economic situation is dire and we have just experienced the crash caused by FTX but this is not the end, be greedy while others are scared. If you are looking for a place to escape the crisis then bitcoin is the perfect choice for you. Do not be afraid and believe in what we have been pursuing for so long. Bull season is not too far away.
